name: Sun Maker
description:
No explanation needed, just try modifying the different parameters and have fun creating your own star!

If you are interested in using it in your own game you can download the Unity custom package. In that case, please consider make a donation. Thanks!   :)

Thanks to XasoSoftware (Creators of the gradient & color picker):
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/easy-color-gradient-picker-176831#r...
